data.text:
Blake Simon is a director and writer known for creating genre films such as FACES (2024), Red Velvet (2023), & Goldilocks (2016).

He graduated LMU School of Film & Television where his sci-fi film Goldilocks was honored at the Director's Guild of America before amassing half a million views online. In 2022 his feature screenplay Return to Sender placed on the Coverfly Red List in the top 2%.

Blake has worked in a variety of roles on multi-million dollar studio films including as a Producer on Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny (2023).

In 2023 his horror short Red Velvet hit festivals winning Audience Choice at the acclaimed Screamfest, Director's Prize at FilmQuest and earning comparisons to Black Mirror and The Twilight Zone.
